form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES

full_text: $.10 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE For OMB NO 43-R0052. Immigration and Naturalization Service ) INFORMATION FEE STAMP APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the MAY 1 6 4974 Immigration and Nationality Act CUB Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball-point pen. Immigration and Naturalization Service issuance New York N. I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt 1. YOUR NAME RANGEL DESIDEAIO ANGEL Card with this application if you checked "Issuance" above. C/O If you checked 'Extension'' you must submit the reentry per- IN CARE OF mit you wish to have extended. (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) MAILING 2376 32st. APT. / ASTORIA ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER ADDRESS (City) (State) (ZIP Code) IN U.S. NEW YORK. N.Y. 11105 A- 12 491 240 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 9-26-1905 CUBH GREEN WHITE HEIGHT 5 FEET 6 INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS 3. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS DESIDERIO A. RANEEL GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS,GRANTED MIAMI, FLA 4-8-61 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER ARRIVED AS REFUGEE - PERMANENT RESIDENCE GRANTED 1-11-66 OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S DESIDERIO (DEBEASED) MARIA MAIDEN NAME (DECEASED) 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL DESIDERIO A RANGEL MIAMI, FLA 9-8-61 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD NEW YORK CITY 7-3-74 ONE MONTH NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL UNKNOWN AT PRESENT FILL'IN ITEM 7, ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY LAST PERMIT 4-3-71 (City and State) NEW YORK CITY IS ATTACHED IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED, STATE EXPIRATION DATE ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: RETIRED NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 265-74-4659 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) UNKNOWN AT PRESENT 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) COSTA RICA 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): PLEASURE RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D-TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM 1-131 (REV. 6-1-73) N OVER 5/13/94
